parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch slots in this sketch

title: ISketch.IGetSketchSlots
description: Gets the sketch slots in this sketch.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch slots in this sketch

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of sketch slots VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling htis method, call
ISketch::GetSketchSlotCount
to get Count.
